name: Alaborn Grenadier
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text:
"Ever proud, ever vigilant."
—Grenadier motto

name: Alaborn Musketeer
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

name: Alaborn Trooper
flavor_text:
"I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King."
—Alaborn Soldier's Oath

name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The man who rose up to fight was not the same man knocked down.

name: Angelic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text: Be at peace, and observe its beauty. Be at war, and feel its justice.

name: Barbtooth Wurm
flavor_text: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

name: Bear Cub
flavor_text:
Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.
—Elvish saying

name: Breath of Life
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Chorus of Woe
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

name: Cruel Edict
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"Such a fragile organ, the brain."
—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Dakmor Bat
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

name: Dakmor Scorpion
flavor_text: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe *around* your boot, but not *in* it.

name: Déjà Vu
oracle_text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: History is the study of repetition.

name: Extinguish
oracle_text: Counter target sorcery spell.

name: False Summoning
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Festival of Trokin
oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text: Everyone loves a good sale.

name: Goblin Cavaliers
flavor_text: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

name: Goblin Glider
oracle_text:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
flavor_text: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

name: Goblin Mountaineer
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

name: Goblin Piker
flavor_text: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Goblin Raider
oracle_text: Goblin Raider can't block.
flavor_text:
"I seen lots o' fights. To win ya gotta bash hard and not get bashed back."
—Goblin grunt

name: Goblin War Strike
oracle_text: Goblin War Strike deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Goblins you control.

name: Golden Bear
flavor_text: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.

name: Hand of Death
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: The touch of death is never gentle.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

name: Lurking Nightstalker
oracle_text: Whenever Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shadows know.

name: Lynx
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.

name: Moaning Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The dead sing their own lullabies.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

name: Muck Rats
flavor_text:
"Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."
—Alaborn soldier

name: Natural Spring
oracle_text: Target player gains 8 life.
flavor_text: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Norwood Archers
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."
—Elvish scout

name: Norwood Ranger
flavor_text: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

name: Norwood Riders
oracle_text: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: "Trade my moose? Sure—when I find a *horse* that can spear ten goblins at a time!"

name: Norwood Warrior
oracle_text: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The woods hold peace for those who desire it, but those who seek battle will find me."

name: Ogre Berserker
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.

name: Ogre Warrior
flavor_text: Assault and battery included.

name: Path of Peace
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
—Former soldier

name: Plated Wurm
flavor_text:
"I'd hate to see the bird that could get *this* wurm!"
—Alaborn soldier

name: Prowling Nightstalker
oracle_text: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.
flavor_text: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Raiding Nightstalker
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text:
"Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Life from death is part of the natural cycle. This is merely a shortcut."
—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

name: Righteous Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Salvage
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"What was taken shall be restored."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Screeching Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Sleight of Hand
oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Steam Frigate
oracle_text: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text:
"Is it merchants or is it pirates?"
"It's Talas—there's no difference."

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: There goes the neighborhood!

name: Swarm of Rats
oracle_text: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

name: Talas Air Ship
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Talas Explorer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Talas Explorer enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

name: Talas Merchant
flavor_text: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.

name: Talas Scout
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Temple Acolyte
oracle_text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

name: Tidal Surge
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor_text: Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back."
—Talas wizard

name: Touch of Brilliance
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I *do* have."

name: Town Sentry
oracle_text: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"So he gots a sword. Big deal."
"Yeah, it's a big deal—it's a big sword!"
—Two goblins outside the gates of Trokin

name: Tree Monkey
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions."
—Talas sailor

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

name: Trokin High Guard
flavor_text: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

name: Volunteer Militia
flavor_text: People fight hardest on their own soil.

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Wind Sail
oracle_text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: It pays to be at home both on the sea *and* in the sky.
